thread.title: Francis tamachaski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Francis tamachaski

author: Francis tamachaski
title: Francis tamachaski
text: Took me two days of missing work to get my matress delivered to my house and this is after the fact that the mattress I purchased less than 6 months ago ripped at the seams. Don't think I will be shopping here again..
